title: FIFA World Cup : players with most matches 1930 to 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Player, and a y axis representing Number of appearances.
The highest category is found at Lothar_Matthäus_(Germany) where Number of appearances is 25.0.
The lowest category is found at Cafu_(Brazil) where Number of appearances is 20.0.
gold: This graph depicts the soccer players with the most appearances at the FIFA World Cup from 1930 to 2018 . The German midfielder , Lothar Matthäus , tops the list , having made 25 appearances at the World Cup between 1982 and 1998 .
